description: You are given a positive integer n representing n cities numbered from 1 to n. You are also given a 2D array roads where roads[i] = [ai, bi, distancei] indicates that there is a bidirectional road between cities ai and bi with a distance equal to distancei. The cities graph is not necessarily connected. The score of a path between two cities is defined as the minimum distance of a road in this path. Return the minimum possible score of a path between cities 1 and n. Note:
